message: Let's use this for interesting articles and discussion on good practices and principles behind templating approaches.
"On Design Minimalism" is also worth a read. http://json-template.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/doc/On-Design-Minimalism.html
"Enforcing Strict Model-View Separation in Template Engines" mentioned in the other topic  is a must read when it comes to template engines. http://www.cs.usfca.edu/~parrt/papers/mvc.templates.pdf
"Mockup-Driven development" by @judofyr who started this group in the first place. http://timelessrepo.com/mockup-driven-development
Anyone has some reading on template engines in the functional programming world (Haskell for example)? Seems like a good use case for those languages.
Clojure Templating Libraries: Fleet and Enlive. http://steve.vinoski.net/pdf/IC-Clojure_Templating_Libraries_Fleet_and_Enlive.pdf
